*FACTS AND INFORMATION*

_I'd appreaciate if you took the time to read this comment. I want to explain a few things and share facts and evidence regarding the pentagon attack._

I'll give sources of information at the end of my comment. '#number'

When people say whatever hit the pentagon was NOT flight 77 they mean it's scientifically impossible that it was a boeing 757. #1
The damage on the pentagon isn't compatible with a boieing 757. You'll see detailed explanation at the end of my comment. Many of the windows weren't even broken eventho the wings and the stabilizers should've destroy them.
The hijacker was a inexperienced pilot who couldn't even fly solo a small single engine Cessna. This is important because the maneuvers he made was over 500mph and are physically impossible to make. Even a fighter pilot said he couldn't do it. Pilots who flew 757's for years said it's impossible. Once they tried to make the same maneuvers on a flight simulator and it was successful. BUT they never released information on the speed they did the simulation. Other simulations were made they NEVER succeeded at or over 500mph. Two 6 ton titanium engine is completely missing. Only one single rotor was released by the FBI which isn't proof that a boeing 757 hit the building. Titanium can't be vaporized (But this is what the official story says). Yet the weakest part of the plane (fuselage) managed to survive. One of these fuselage parts have visible writing on them... But two 6 ton titanium engine disappeared as well as the strong wings, stabilizers, tail.

Your next question would probably be (this was mine first instinct question also) what happened to the passengers and flight 77? #2
I don't know the answer to this question. One strong possibility is Operation Northwood. But there is no proof to it. Please watch the video which was made by infographics youtube channel. Check out the comments section also... everyone is discussion this topic overthere.

Multiple explosion occurred. Even as late as 10:10am (over 30 mins after the impact). Many pentagon workers said it was like multiple explosions. Many say bombs. One even said he could clearly smell cordite (which is gunpowder) and that has completely different smell than jet fuel. #3
